# Getting Started

## 1 Load package


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(ggrepel, patchwork, ggthemes,
               hrbrthemes, tidyverse, ggplot2)
```
:::


## 2 Import Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_df <- read.csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


## 3 Draw

### 3.1 Histogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = exam_df,
       aes(x = ENGLISH)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


### 3.2 Density


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = exam_df,
       aes(x = ENGLISH,
           color = CLASS)) +
  geom_density(color = "#1696d2",
  adjust = .65,
  alpha = .6)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
